methods.name: contains
methods.description: Returns true if the org cache contains a cached value corresponding to the specified key.

methods.name: contains
methods.description: Returns true if the org cache contains the specified key entries.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Returns the cached value corresponding to the specified key from the org cache.

methods.name: get
methods.signature: public static Object get(System.Type cacheBuilder, String key)
methods.description: Returns the cached value corresponding to the specified key from the org cache. Use this method if your cached value is a class that implements the CacheBuilder interface.

methods.name: getAvgGetTime
methods.description: Returns the average time taken to get a key from the org cache, in nanoseconds.

methods.name: getAvgValueSize
methods.description: Returns the average item size for keys in the org cache, in bytes.

methods.name: getCapacity
methods.description: Returns the percentage of org cache capacity that has been used.

methods.name: getKeys
methods.description: Returns a set of all keys that are stored in the org cache and visible to the invoking namespace.

methods.name: getMaxGetTime
methods.description: Returns the maximum time taken to get a key from the org cache, in nanoseconds.

methods.name: getMaxValueSize
methods.description: Returns the maximum item size for keys in the org cache, in bytes.

methods.name: getMissRate
methods.description: Returns the miss rate in the org cache.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the default cache partition.

methods.name: getNumKeys
methods.description: Returns the total number of keys in the org cache.

methods.name: getPartition
methods.description: Returns a partition from the org cache that corresponds to the specified partition name.

methods.name: put
methods.signature: public static void put(String key, Object value)
methods.description: Stores the specified key/value pair as a cached entry in the org cache. The put method can write only to the cache in your org’s namespace.

methods.name: put
methods.signature: public static void put(String key, Object value, Cache.Visibility visibility)
methods.description: Stores the specified key/value pair as a cached entry in the org cache and sets the cached value’s visibility.

methods.name: put
methods.signature: public static void put(String key, Object value, Integer ttlSecs)
methods.description: Stores the specified key/value pair as a cached entry in the org cache and sets the cached value’s lifetime.

methods.name: put
methods.signature: public static void put(String key, Object value, Integer ttlSecs, cache.Visibility visibility, Boolean immutable)
methods.description: Stores the specified key/value pair as a cached entry in the org cache. This method also sets the cached value’s lifetime, visibility, and whether it can be overwritten by another namespace.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Deletes the cached value corresponding to the specified key from the org cache.

methods.name: remove
methods.signature: public static Boolean remove(System.Type cacheBuilder, String key)
methods.description: Deletes the cached value corresponding to the specified key from the org cache. Use this method if your cached value is a class that implements the CacheBuilder interface.
